question.questionText: Georgia found one brown mineral and one black mineral. How can she test them for hardness using only the 2 minerals (no tools)?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Rub the minerals together and see which one scratches the other.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: She can rub them against each other.
Rub one of the minerals against the other one and see if it has a mark or a scratch.
Rub them together and see if one scratches the other!
